access: Pine leshies have access to this feat
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Climate Adaptation](/Feats.aspx?ID=3430) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Quest for the Frozen Flame</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Leshy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=225" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 77</row>

**Access**
Pine leshies have access to this feat

</column>

---

Like evergreen trees, which stay healthy and vibrant from winter through summer, you too can adapt to a variety of extreme climates. You're unaffected by mild cold or heat environmental effects, and when you're in severe cold or heat, you take the effects of mild cold or heat instead (see [Table 10–13](/Rules.aspx?ID=642)). This doesn't protect you from extreme or incredible cold or heat.

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 5" pfs="Limited" > Climate Adaptation May contain spoilers from Quest for the Frozen Flame Source Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley pg. 77 Access Pine leshies have access to this feat --- Like evergreen trees, which stay healthy and vibrant from winter through summer, you too can adapt to a variety of extreme climates. You're unaffected by mild cold or heat environmental effects, and when you're in severe cold or heat, you take the effects of mild cold or heat instead (see Table 10–13). This doesn't protect you from extreme or incredible cold or heat.
